title: Mafia Traitor

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: > Use the abilities of the role you get.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
> You will be given a random Mafia role. That is your role, but you win with the Town.

> You will not gain permanent defense, even if your role grants that.

> You will not get access to the factional chat, you will also not get access to the factional kill.

> You will not get roles who can only target/affect members of the Mafia.

> You will not get Mafia (Head) roles.

desc:
Post 1548
*"Tell us who the Mafia is!"*
*"Yeah sorry, I forgot their names and faces. Don't worry though I can make a dead body nice and clean!"*
*"..."*
